long_description: The NRS Co-Pilot river knife is compact to fit nicely on your PFD. It packs an array of useful features for your waterborne adventures. HC Stainless-steel blade with blunt safety tip has both smooth and serrated cutting edges; PVD (physical vapor deposition) thin-film coating helps reduce wear. Glass-reinforced polypropylene handle with molded thermoplastic rubber provides a reliable grip. Square hole in the handle serves as a valve wrench for an oxygen tank. Bottle opener is built into the handle. NRS Co-Pilot river knife comes with a glass-reinforced nylon sheath that firmly locks the knife into place and releases it with a squeeze of both sides of the release.
short_description: The NRS Co-Pilot river knife is compact to fit nicely on your PFD. It packs an array of useful features for your waterborne adventures.
